Plot: Jean, a farm lad, wants to escape his silent father; he runs to Paris to his older brother, Georges, who's away covering the war in Kosovo. Angry, he throws a bag of half-eaten pastry into ...
Title: Code Unknown
Actors: Juliette Binoche, Thierry Neuvic, Josef Bierbichler, Alexandre Hamidi
tomatoConsensus: Though challengingly cryptic at times, Code Unknown still manages to resonate.
Language: Malinka, Romanian, French, German, English, Arabic, French Sign Language
